name: Master Bait
description:
So I bought you (master bait) for 250000$ on a weird sketchy online shop.

Man, please don't die cause I bought you for a lot of cash.

Try not to die but still give me fish. And you also have the power to fly above water. I g changed you and mutated you in various ways to give you the power to lure them out so... help me get fish.

Use WASD or mouse (Left click) to move.

Don't touch the fishes, they WILL eat you.

The long blue guy will cut the string like a sissors, so be careful about that.

Big fishes give you more points but are hard to lure.

My high score: 48
